content: अव्यथ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not giving or inflicting pain, merciful. {@--2@} Free from pain. --थः [न व्यथते पद्भ्यां न संचलति व्यथ् भयचलनयोः अच्] A snake. --था {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of two plants; Terminalia Citrina Roxb.; and Hibiscus Mutabilis. {@--2@} Dry ginger. {@--3@} (<ab>Ved.</ab>) Firmness, steadiness.
